page.title: 14A KEEP FIT FANATIC
page.content: Nowadays fitness freaks and in particular, joggers, are not seen as the 'loonies' they were once labelled as. Why? Because more and more people take to the streets to jog every day. Mike Stanard is a jogger but takes his training a little more seriously as he does 5 miles daily and at weekends runs marathons. But why does he do it? Purely for the satisfaction of winning. That isn't the goal of the average everday jogger but there is usually some purpose involved in jogging, whether it is to lose weight, to become fitter or just to keep up with friends. Mike feels that everyone would benefit from spending at least some time each day taking exercise of some kind even if they don't intend to run in a marathon.
